subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mets pitcher Steve Trachsel left yesterday's game against the Yankees with tightness in his right groin, but afterward he seemed much more concerned about the waning seconds of a World Cup match.
snippet: Mets pitcher Steve Trachsel left yesterday's game against the Yankees with tightness in his right groin, but afterward he seemed much more concerned about the waning seconds of a World Cup match.
